thread.title: BRIEF-Capitaland Retail China Trust Says HSBC Institutional Trust Services (Singapore) Enters Facility Agreement ​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Capitaland Retail China Trust Says HSBC Institutional Trust Services (Singapore) Enters Facility Agreement ​

organizations.name: brief-capitaland retail china trust says hsbc institutional trust services

text:
Jan 8 (Reuters) - Capitaland Retail China Trust:
* HSBC INSTITUTIONAL TRUST SERVICES (SINGAPORE) AS CO‘S TRUSTEE ENTERED FACILITY AGREEMENT ​
* AS PER AGREEMENT CONDITIONS, TOTAL LEVEL OF BORROWINGS OUTSTANDING WHICH MAY BE AFFECTED ABOUT S$750.0 MILLION AS AT JAN. 8
* ‍FACILITY AGREEMENT CONTAINS PREPAYMENT EVENT IF CO CEASES TO BE MANAGED BY MANAGER OR ANY UNIT OF CAPITALAND MALL ASIA Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
